GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
media: imon: fix a race condition in send_packet()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit ddf2141e9e6ec07eafb97f1d6d15e4d39517b3cc, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit 21677cfc562a27e099719d413287bc8d1d24deb7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: media: imon: fix a race condition in send_packet()
